attributes.action: To standardize the cost of passports no matter where renewed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of renewal of a UK passport in the Uk is £66, to renew the same passport at the British Embassy in Paris is 185 Euros or approximately £125. How can the British goverment justify this difference in cost? We are not even given the choice of renewal in the UK.
